1.title: Baanke the Cook/Yamuna Snan
1.plot: Baanke the Cook- The stage is set for the modern day confrontation between Kansa and Krishna. Both have assumed human form once again: Krishna, as the orphan Kris of Mathura orphanage and Kansa as Mr. Kanishk, the orphanage's principal. In the first, among a series of attempts to assassinate Kris, Kansa plots with his man-serpent minion Baanke. Disguised as a cook, Baanke enchants all the children of Mathura orphanage with his delicacies. Can Kris save his friends form the Baanke's spell and put an end to Kansa's plan? / A Dip in the Yamuna - Kanishk organizes for all...

2.title: Panic? What's That?/Teacher's Pet
2.plot: Panic? What's That: Kris' gang of friends decides to plan a picnic. While Kris is busy trying to figure what exactly humans do on picnics, Kansa is busy commanding Vrischika, his scorpion demoness to crush Kris to bits. Does Kris slip out of Vrischikaa's clutches and put an end to Kansa's evil plot once again? Teacher's Pet: This time around Kanishk plots to defeat Kris through his shape-shifting kitten, Sundari. Though a cute kitten at sight, Sundari is in reality a ferocious lioness waiting for the right time to pounce on Kris and his friends.

3.title: The New Student/The Magic Brush
3.plot: The New Student: Kanishk appoints Ms. Suparna as the Chemisrty Teacher, who is one of his semi-human demons from Netherworld. Suparna tries to kill Kris with a fiery Gremlin, who is reduced to dust By Krishna. She also plots to kill Kris with a ladoo bomb - but again Kris manages to see through Kanishk's evil designs. The Magic Brush: Unable to kill Kris, with his demons from the Neterworld, Kansa now plans a more elaborate plot with a magical brush that can give life to hideous monsters with every painting it creates. With this brush, Kansa sends to Kris's class the ...

4.title: Happy Diwali/Music Teacher
4.plot: Happy Diwali: The children of Mathura Anath Ashram are all celebrating Diwali, the festival of lights. But unknown to all, Kansa unleashes his fire-demon or Jwalasur, to wreck havoc among the festivities of Diwali. Will Kris put an end to Jwalasur? Music Teacher: The children of Mathura Anath Ashram are greatly amused by the jazzy antics of Besur Das, their new western music teacher. Besur Das is none other than another of Kansa's minions from the Netherworld. Besur Das's evil music lessons come to a sorry end, when Krishna confronts him.

5.title: Miss Sangeeta's Musical/The Museum
5.plot: Miss Sangeeta's Musical: Once again Kansa tries to defeat Kris with the aid of the enchantress, Sangeetha. Sangeetha almost manages to gain control of everyone at Mathura Anath Ashram with her lilting notes of music. Will Kris put an end to Sangeetha's deadly music? The Museum: Principal Kanishk plans a trip to the museum for the children of Mathura Anath Ashram. Amongst the artifacts and relics in the museum is an old, rusted armor. The armor is none other than Kansa most formidable commander from Netherworld. Will Kris combat the attack of the warrior-commander who ...

6.title: The Yoga Guru from Netherworld/The Football Match
6.plot: The Yoga Guru: Yogachari, a yoga teacher comes to Mathura Anath Ashram to improve the physical health of the children. But Yogachari's true objective is to kill Kris as per Kansa's orders. The Football Match: Defeated time and again by Kris, Kanishk now unleashes six deadly demons from the netherworld disguised as football players. Kanishk then arranges for a match between the kids and the demons.

7.title: Spooky Fanfair/Shadiow Play
7.plot: Spooky Fanfair: There's a lot of excitement at Mathura Anath Ashram, when a fair comes to the city of Mathura. But again the fair is but a plot by Kansa's minion Chakram to eliminate Krishna. Shadown Play: Kris is playacting as the coy rabbit in the school - play. As the class plays out their various roles in the play, Kanishk is busy playing out his new ruse to vanquish Kris with the new drama teacher: Chaya Maya.

8.title: The Scarecrow/Obstacle Race
8.plot: The Scarecrow: Kris and his gang of friends are off to village farmhouse with Principal Kanishk. Not one to give up, Principal Kanishk has planted yet another of his demons-Bhusasur or the scarecrow demon - in wait for Kris. Kris eventually thwarts yet another of Kansa's demons. Obstacle Race: When Vasudev is declared unwell, BY Dr, J, a day before an obstacle race, which has been arranged, Principal brings in a replacement PT Sir: Rockwinder. Rockwinder is none other than the demon Pattharasur who plans to avenge Kansa's previous defeats at the hands of Kris during ...

9.title: Somthing's Fishy/Air Way
9.plot: Somthing's Fishy: As the Kids of Mathura Anath Ashram enjoy the waves at Manthan beach, Principal Kanishk asks them to be careful, and introduces the lifeguard: Mr. Sharakasur. However the lifeguard seems keener on devouring the Kids like delicacies rather than protecting them. Why wouldn't he be, after all ha is none other than Kansa's fish demon. Air Way: Desperate to defeat Krishna, Kansa brings from Netherworld an ingenious demon: Hawasur or the wind-demon.

10.title: Tooth Break/Evil Fountain
10.plot: Tooth Break: Kanishk once again challenges Kris at the healthy teeth contest with the help of Dr. J and Kankalasur. However Kris valiantly foils Kankalasur's attempts at the healthy tooth contest. Kankalasur then tries to get even with Kris by hypnotizing his friends. Evil Fountain: Sorceress Suparna presents before Kansa, Jal Pithumba or the Water-demon from the Nether world. Kansa mixes Jalpithumba with water-fountain in the premises of the Anath Asram. JalPithumba lets all hell loose in Mathura Anath Ashram, till he's put in place by Krishna.

11.title: Janmashthami
11.plot: Its Janmashtahmai-the birthday of Lord Krishna and everyone's busy in preparing to celebrate the Lord's birthday. Not to be outdone by anyone Kanishk does his own preparations for Lord Krishna's Birthday. His set of presents for Kris include Hawasur, a water demon, poisoned makhan, chilly -coated ladoos and an attempt to topple him from a human pyramid. Will Kris enjoy his birthday, despite Kansa's schemes?

12.title: Holi/Bun Bun Mausi's Web
12.plot: Holi: On the eve of Holi, Kanishk tries to score with Kris by unleashing Jwalasur and Dhuasur. Like all the demons before them, both Jwalasur and Dhuasur receive a sound thrashing at the hands of Kris and Kanishk is left wringing his hands in defeat and frustration. Bun Bun Mauri's Web: Bun Bun Masi comes to Mathura Anath Ashram, with warm winter-clothes to ward off Mathura's cold winter. Bun Bun Masi, however is no plain seamstress, she is a spider demoness, one of Kansa's minions.

13.title: Kansa's Birthday/The Vridavan Garden
13.plot: Kansa's Birthday: Kris has dressed up as peacock, Radha as a Japanese doll, Madhu as a calculator for the Principal Kanishk's birthday party. Kanishk, meanwhile is all but jovial on his birthday. Why? Because all attempts to defeat Kris have been turned to dust. Suparna tries to cheer up her master with the perfect birthday gift: a plan to destroy Kris. Thus comes Jokerasur:; the entertainer for the birthday party, who sole objective is Kris's destruction. The Vridavan Garden: Dr. J gets another minion-demon for Kansa to attack Kris. This time around it's a plant ...

imdb.plot outline: Kansa, the evil king of Mathura, returns to Earth as Kanishk to finally conquer and reign supreme over the land. Masking his cruel intentions under the disguise of a great humanitarian and principal of a school for orphans, the gods must act quickly before he assembles a zombie army to use in his quest. They send beloved blue boy Krishna to Mathura, as Kris, a student of the school. It's battle time again: Kanishk V Kris. May the best man win!
imdb.title: Roll No. 21
plot: Kansa, the evil king of Mathura, returns to Earth as Kanishk to finally conquer and reign supreme over the land. Masking his cruel intentions under the disguise of a great humanitarian and principal of a school for orphans, the gods must act quickly before he assembles a zombie army to use in his quest. They send beloved blue boy Krishna to Mathura, as Kris, a student of the school. It's battle time again: Kanishk V Kris. May the best man win!::Anna Lai
